info.title: ParsChat (Demo)
info.description:
ParsChat is your intelligent assistant, developed by the knowledge-based company ParsTech AI. 

This chatbot can check inventory and price lists for you and place orders at any time of the day. 
It can also be added to your website as a widget, and it's useful in banking, electronic services, and even in industries and mining. 

ParsTech, with its strong technical team and collaboration with European companies, has developed various products and technologies in the field of artificial intelligence.
